description: This dashboard provides an overview of the standard AWS RDS metrics (Via FireHose from CloudWatch), so you can track key metrics around database connections, resource utilization, and replication status.

panels.description: The number of outstanding I/Os (read/write requests) waiting to access the disk.
panels.title: Disk Queue Depth by Instance

panels.description: The percentage of throughput and I/O credits remaining in the burst bucket of your RDS database. This metric is available for basic monitoring only.
panels.title: EBS Bytes/IO Balance
Active Sessions Not in "CPU wait" Status

title: CloudWatch - RDS
